venue_visual_description: The Matiatia Wharf Ferry Terminal on Waiheke Island serves as a bustling gateway, nestled within the picturesque Matiatia Bay on the island's western side. The geographic setting is defined by steep hills, rising up to 80 meters, that frame the bay and are covered
